```ts
function formatQi(value): string
```

Converts `value` into a decimal string using 3 decimal places.

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `value` | [`BigNumberish`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/BigNumberish) | The value to convert. |

## Returns

`string`

The converted value.
